Get Metal Parts Quote Now
Have your questions with HLC metal parts? Can't find the right metal parts manufacturer you need? Let our experts help you with that.
Our Clients Question
What types of metal parts can you manufacture?
Our manufacturing services specialize in producing a wide range of metal parts, including precision components, sheet metal parts, and machined.
Can you meet
MOQ requirements?
Absolutely! HLC can manufacture metal parts exactly to the customer's project production needs. We have the capability and flexibility to meet varying quantities of orders.
What materials do you use in manufacturing?
We carefully select the appropriate materials based on the specific requirements of your project, including stainless steel, aluminum, brass, copper, titanium, and various alloys.
How do you manufacture metal parts?
Metal parts are manufactured through a multi-step process that typically involves design, material selection, fabrication, machining, and finishing. It begins with creating a design or receiving specifications from the customer.
How can I request a quote for my project?
Provide us with detailed 2D/3D, or samples via email, and get an accurate quote within 24 hours.
What is your quality management system?
HLC has obtained IATF16949:2016 and ISO13485:2016 system certification

About us
HLC METAL PARTS LTD(HLC) is a professional manufacturer of metal and plastic parts.We are specialized in the development and design of precision tooling and the production of precision metal parts (such as precision casting, stamping ,CNC machining metal parts) and plastic parts.Â We also provide assembling and fitting service of metal and plastic accessories. The accessories we produced are widely used in the fields of electronics, electric equipment, communication devices, medical devices, optical devices, automotive parts, etc.
HLC is ISO13485 / IATF16949 certified. And we have implemented a policy of continual improvement . We are committed to improve ourcompany's core competitiveness, so as to maintain a leading level in the industry continuously.
We aim to provide our customers with worry-free service, and create win-win situation, all of this has gained HLC high reputation among our customers.
2003: HLC Metal Parts Ltd. was established, focusing on stamping parts, machining parts, and silver contacts.
2012: HLC acquired ISO9001:2009 certification.
2013: Partes Metalicas de Mexico S.A.DE C.V. was established, specializing in the development and design of precision stamping auto parts, expanding your reach into Mexico.
2017: HLC further enhanced its commitment to automotive quality by acquiring IATF:16949 certification.
2020: The establishment of Cowon Mold Tech Co., Ltd., specializing in plastic injection molds and jigs for the automotive industry, signifies diversification within the industry.
2023: The setup of HLC Bulgaria office reflects your commitment to better serving your clients.

About HLC Metal Parts Company
HLC Metal Parts Co., Ltd., founded in Dongguan, China in 2003, is a pprofessional manufacturer of precision metal components. Our expertise lies in the development and design of metal molds, as well as the fabrication of various metal parts, including but not limited to OEM stamping parts, CNC machining parts, silver contacts, shrapnel, and auto parts.
To further expand our manufacturing service capabilities, we have established factories and offices in Mexico, Italy, and Bulgaria. Over the past 20 years, we have successfully served more than 500 customers, providing them with over 100 million pieces of precision metal parts for their customized projects. Our unwavering commitment to quality and customer satisfaction has earned us the coveted ISO13485 and IATF16949 certifications.
At HLC Metal Parts Ltd, we pride ourselves on providing exceptional customer service, from the initial inquiry to the final delivery.
Our Milestone

January 1, 2017

January 1, 2011
New Branch in Hunan
HLC Metal Parts LTD (Hunan Branch) was set up and certified by ISO9001:2008.
Augest 08, 2003

Trusted by Industry Leaders worldwide

Our Offices
HLC has a number of outstanding and professional management and technical foreign employee. With principle of “High Quality, Low cost, Superior service” , we focus on maintaining high standards in technology, quality, service and management aspects.

results.title: HLC METAL PARTS LTD - Information and distributors ... - DirectIndustry
results.content: HLC METAL PARTS LTD (HLC) is a professional manufacturer of metal parts. We are technical in the development and design of precision tooling and the production of precision metal parts (such as precision casting, stamping, CNC machining metal parts) and plastic parts. We also provide assembling and fitting services of metal and plastic accessories.
results.raw_content:
HLC METAL PARTS LTD
Who we are
HLC METAL PARTS LTD(HLC) is a professional manufacturer of metal parts. We are technical in the development and design of precision tooling and the production of precision metal parts (such as precision casting, stamping, CNC machining metal parts) and plastic parts. We also provide assembling and fitting services of metal and plastic accessories.
In 2003, HLC was established in Dongguan, China. Professional customization, manufacturing hardware parts according to customer needs (samples, 2D & 3D drawings).
In 2013, our new factory (HLC Partes Metalicas de Mexico S.A. DE C.V.) was established in Monterrey, Mexico. Specializing in the designing and manufacturing of plastic injection molds and jigs for automotive industry.
The total factory area: 12,000 square meters. Stamping product production line, there are 35 stamping machines. Tolerances can reach 0.01mm, including electrical contacts and contact assemblies. Machined product production line, with 45 machines, the tolerance can meet 0.003mm~0.005mm. Machined parts are widely used in different fields.
HLC is IATF16949 & ISO13485 certified. With 20 years of manufacturing experience, we are committed to serving our customers, such as ABB, TE, Panasonic, Flextronics, Magna, GM, Alfanar, Noventa, etc. Improving the company's core competitiveness and continuing to maintain the industry's leading level.
Our values
HLC has several outstanding and professional management and technical employee.With the principle of "High Quality, Low cost, Superior service", we focus on maintaining high standards in technology, quality, service, and management aspects.

We have the products and solutions for any size home design project.
Introducing EverPlank Luxury Vinyl Siding from Mastic
EverPlank is the newest category of plank siding revolutionizing the industry with a combination of real wood aesthetic and the trusted durability of vinyl.
Beautifully Designed Windows with an Attention to Detail.
Our windows enhance your home’s architectural character with a variety of design options along with energy efficiency and comfort you demand.
#1 Manufacturer of Vinyl Siding in North America
Exceptional durability, beautiful color choices, and an industry leading warranty make Ply Gem siding the smart choice for homeowners.
Decades of Experience in Contemporary Stone Veneer
Whether you’re searching for that cozy indoor fireplace or statement curb appeal, our hand-crafted stone veneer adds accents to your home that are as timeless as they are stunning.
Fixer to Fabulous Hosts Dave & Jenny Marrs for Mastic
Mastic Siding partners and HGTV stars Dave and Jenny Marrs are passionate about the building and remodeling work they do and the transformations they make happen. That’s why when it comes to a homes’ exterior, the choice is clear for this power couple – Mastic Siding & Accessories.
With Dave being an expert craftsman, builder and general contractor and Jenny the creative backbone of the couple’s renovations, this duo gives homeowners the designs they want matched with the performance they need with Mastic’s diverse product lines.
Look for videos, events and content that speak to reasons why Dave & Jenny rely on Mastic siding for their home renovations, historic restorations and new construction homes.
Explore Our Products
Choose from thousands of design and color combinations or browse by brand to create a home perfect for you.
Learn about our many siding styles and brands to find what fits your home perfectly.
Browse our window styles and discover what makes each one unique.
Browse our collection of door styles including sliding and hinged patio doors.
Learn about the handcrafted details put into this popular style for your home.
Explore our full range of options for fence & railing.
Browse our array of popular types and colors that you coordinate with your siding.
Explore our selection of long lasting, seamless gutters for your home.
Browse our selection of low-maintenance trim and mouldings.
More Styles, Performance, Training and Tools with Mastic
Mastic Siding & Accessories combines more innovation with more imagination to create advanced, science-based vinyl solutions for contractors that enhance residential curb appeal and are backed by a V.I.P. Limited Lifetime Warranty.
Discover the Ideal Exterior Palette for Your Home
Our Home Design Visualizer is the ultimate tool for design inspiration and discovery. Try out combinations of colors and textures until you find the one that speaks to you.
News and Insights
Learn more about industry best practices, keep up with recent product updates, and catch the latest news from Ply Gem Residential Solutions.
Select Ply Gem Products Identified as ENERGY STAR 2023 Most Efficient!
For maximum energy-efficient windows and doors with enhanced comfort choose the Ply Gem vinyl windows and doors styles and options designated as ENERGY STAR® 2023 Most Energy Efficient.
Help build affordable housing for families during Covid-19
12 million households have at least one contributing member working in an industry at-risk due to the COVID-19 pandemic, making affordable housing a vital need. We’re donating exterior  products to help support Habitat for Humanity’s COVID relief efforts in communities impacted by the pandemic, but we need your help to do even more.
The dramatic appeal of black windows
Both timeless and modern, choose black windows to create visual drama and add stunning curb appeal.  This on-trend color lends itself to contemporary design but also works beautifully with any architectural-style home for added contrast and flair.
Ply Gem Residential Solutions© 2024, a Division of the Cornerstone Building Brands Family

results.title: CNC Machining Services | Custom CNC Parts - hlc-metalparts.com
results.content: CNC machining is a highly precise and efficient manufacturing process , if you are looking for a reliable manufacturing partner that can deliver quality products on time and within budget, look no further than HLC Metal Parts Ltd. 5-axis CNC machines, allowing us to produce complex parts with fewer setups and greater precision.
results.raw_content:
CNC Machining Service
Our CNC Machining Capabilities
Whether you need a one-off prototype or a large-scale production run, we have the expertise and resources to get the job done right.
CNC Milling
If you need custom parts with precise tolerances and flat surfaces, look no further than our 3-axis & 5-axis CNC milling services. Delivering milled parts with tight tolerances of up to 0.01mm.
Learn more
CNC Turning
When it comes to cylindrical components like pins, shafts, and spacers, or any parts with rotational symmetry, turning them on a lathe is typically the most efficient and cost-effective solution.
Learn more
CNC machining is a highly precise and efficient manufacturing process , if you are looking for a reliable manufacturing partner that can deliver quality products on time and within budget, look no further than HLC Metal Parts Ltd.
▅ 5-axis CNC machines, allowing us to produce complex parts with fewer setups and greater precision.
▅ Produce CNC parts with a size range of 0.2 inches to 8 inches in diameter and up to 20 inches in length.
▅ We use advanced CAM software to program our CNC machines, allowing us to optimize tool paths and reduce costing.
▅ CNC machines are equipped with automatic tool changers, allowing us to reduce setup times and increasing productivity.
Gallery of CNC machined parts
We machine rapid prototypes and low-volume production orders for customers in multiple industries: aerospace, automotive, defense, electronics, hardware startups, industrial automation, machinery, manufacturing, medical devices, oil & gas and robotics.
Cold Heading Services
Brass Turned Parts
Custom Copper Rivet
Machining Components
Custom Heat Sink
Custom Cnc Prototyping
Precision Cnc Milling Parts
Here's How We Do lt
Watch this video
This video provides an overview of our multi-station machining centers, which are used to produce high volumes of precision-machined components for many industries
Request a Custom Quote
Material for Custom CNC Machining Parts
The product processing material depends on the customer's choice. Our engineering team will also evaluate the material and give advice, we can generate instant machining quotes for 30+ metals and plastics.
Copper is a good electrical and thermal conductive metal material with excellent mechanical properties and good processing properties
Types: C11000, HPB59
Aluminum is a lightweight, corrosion-resistant metallic material. High strength, good processability
Types: 1050, 1060, 2024, 2A16, 2A02, 3003, 3A21, 4A01 5051, 5083, etc.
Steel is a commonly used metal material that is primarily composed of iron with a certain amount of carbon and other elements.
Types: 12L14, 1215, SUM22, SUS303, SUS304, SUS430, SUS316, etc.
Brass is an alloy composed of copper and zinc, with a reddish-gold appearance. It is commonly used in applications where low friction is required
Types: C3601, C3602, C3603, C3604, C3605, C3712, C3771, etc.
Our CNC machining services cater to a wide range of plastic materials, from commonly used to specialty options.
Types: ABS, PTFE, PVC, PE, etc.
Depending on the customer's drawings, different machining requirements and performance specifications, specific materials are selected.
Types: Zinc, Titanium, Cast Iron, Nylon, etc.
Finishing Options for CNC Machining
Different surface treatments are available according to each project
